channel.title: [500+?] Shop Config Script
channel.description:
Normal Stores =============================
Send to the client the following script:
[code] id: 25, params: [0, 727 + shopId] [/code]
What does it do?
[img width=750]http://i.imgur.com/jLnZxeq.png[/img]
It will automatically set the items in the shop window (id: 620). The image above is shop id 1.

item.title: [500+?] Shop Config Script
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4

@arham_4 wrote:

P.S: Whoever needs all the IDs:

i got warned for posting that this was the real shit wtf…

The mods are getting really abusive.

You should really see web guys infractions. Once you do, you’ll be very dissapointed. I know I was.
[/quote]or maybe he was actually breaking the rules? If I remember correctly there was vulgar language there originally ~^[/quote]people get warned for language even if it’s not disrespectful now?

item.title: [500+?] Shop Config Script
item.dc:creator: @Java-RSPS-Noob Java-RSPS-Noob
item.description:
@Java-RSPS-Noob wrote:

[quote=“sinisoul, post:4, topic:529096”][quote author=Arcik link=topic=647850.msg4357328#msg4357328 date=1377963336]
You’re a bit slow
[/quote]

Technically, but Im fairly sure there is a config for this. I just dont know the id. Also the ‘shop id’ is really a runescript constant, people don’t know about that.[/quote]really? I didn’t know this either. So in reality people are hardcoding shops when there are configs for them?

Read full topic

item.title: [500+?] Shop Config Script
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

Arcik:

You’re a bit slow

Technically, but Im fairly sure there is a config for this. I just dont know the id. Also the ‘shop id’ is really a runescript constant, people don’t know about that.

Read full topic
